amendment.description: To allow reciprocity for the carrying of certain concealed firearms.

vote.text: Amendment SA 719, under the order of 4/16/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 43. Record Vote Number: 100.

action.text: Amendment SA 719 proposed by Senator Cornyn.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 719, under the order of 4/16/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 43. Record Vote Number: 100.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 719 proposed by Senator Cornyn.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 719, under the order of 4/16/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 43. Record Vote Number: 100.
